snippet: The choreographer David Dorfman brings a more personal, introspective and family-oriented perspective to his latest work, having its premiere at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Choreographer David Dorfman brings more personal, introspective and family-oriented perspective to his latest work Come, and Back Again; piece, which focuses on his life after serious 2007 car accident, will be performed at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer David Dorfman brings a more personal, introspective and family-oriented perspective to his latest work, having its premiere at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: For the Choreographer David Dorfman, It’s Now Personal
headline.main: Happy to Be Alive ... and Dancing
headline.print_headline: Happy to Be Alive ... and Dancing
